about_the_game:
After enduring a long and intense war in Hero by Chance II, it's time to unwind and find solace in Romance & Reprisal. This sequel brings a delightful blend of romance, humor, and lightheartedness, creating a serene atmosphere for you to cherish romantic moments with the enchanting ladies. However, do brace yourself for unexpected twists, new mysteries, and extraordinary events that will keep you engaged and enthralled throughout your journey.

Two new dates and seven special scenes, not only featuring the three new girls but also your favorite characters from Hero by Chance II. We have taken into account your desires, and the special scene feature has been refined to offer you an enhanced romantic experience.

Main Features:
🔹 3 new elite units that bring diverse strategies to the battlefield.

🔹 You can now collect the final skins for your favorite elite units from the base game, including Drogakan legionnaires.

🔹 Participate in the exhilarating Arena mode, which offers 50 challenging battles with valuable rewards.

🔹 Deploy various fortifications and bolster your defenses.

🔹 The new Battle Card system also adds an additional layer of strategic depth to your battles.

🔹 Discover a plethora of incredibly powerful ultimate equipment for your units and generals, equipped with new and mighty skills.
🔹 Immerse yourself in epic battles and captivating stories with over 20+ amazing melodies.
🔹 Unlock new technologies for research, new hero passives, and much more awaits you to explore.
